# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates an imputer with a strategy.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ strategy: NumericImputer<Element>.Strategy)
```

## Creating an estimator

- **init(constant:)**: Creates an imputer with a constant value to use when replacing missing values.
